entry.content: Many linux afficionados are very passionate about their distribution of choice, with thousands of threads and blog posts all across the web proclaiming that all other distros pale in comparison. I myself enjoy Ubuntu, however vanilla Gnome 3 is extremely resource intensive, and not at all suited to running on slightly lower end devices. Thusly, I use Ubuntu Budgie, which consists of Ubuntu coupled with a port of the Budgie desktop from Solus 4.
